doc:
Gilbert Price https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gilbert_Price 0 Gilbert Price (September 10, 1942 – January 2, 1991) was an American operatic baritone and actor. Price was a protégé of Langston Hughes. He was a life member of New York's famed Actors Studio. Price first gained notice in 1964, for his performances in Hughes' Off-Broadway production of Jerico-Jim Crow. For his work, Price received a Theatre World Award. Gilbert_Price ( September_10_,_1942 – January_2_,_1991 ) was an_American_operatic_baritone_and_actor . Price was a_protégé of Langston_Hughes . He was a_life_member of New_York 's_famed_Actors_Studio . Price first_gained notice in 1964 , for his_performances in Hughes '_Off-Broadway_production of Jerico-Jim_Crow . For his_work , Price received a_Theatre_World_Award .
